main event: On July 23, 1965, a retired police officer in Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania reported seeing a large glowing object that hovered and then accelerated rapidly out of sight.
interesting points: The object was tracked on radar and visually observed for 6 minutes,The object exhibited unusual flight characteristics, accelerating to an estimated speed of 2000 mph,The witness was confirmed to be reliable,The sighting occurred at 11:30 PM on July 23, 1965,The presence of no physical evidence was noted.
